name: Laguna del Tule

reviews.text: This property is not an all inclusive or fancy property, but it's decent accommodations, with friendly staff. The location is great, as it's right on the beach, and the price is right.
reviews.title: Nothing fancy, but decent accomodations with a community feel to it.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The owners and family along with family friends all work here, and host lots of celebrations at the property, which they will sometimes invite you to.
reviews.title: Pretty Good But........

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was my first trip, but my family has been staying at this property for the last 4 years and really enjoy it. One thing you will notice is there are a lot of regulars that come back every year and everyone in the town seems quite friendly.
reviews.title: Great to stay for the price

likes.liked: — The location close to the sea
likes.disliked: — The smell in the room and the fact that it wasn't very safe because the windows didn't close

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: One thing to note though is it can be loud at times. Lots of people celebrating birthdays, Christmas and new years; but I think it calms down a bit after NYE. As well its very family friendly so you will notice lots of kids around the pool, but there is space on the deeper end for the adults.
reviews.title: Gret place with great hosts

likes.liked: — The rooms were clean and well looked after , also they were very spacious
likes.disliked: — nothing that I can think of

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As noted by someone else, the windows don't close so you will need to adjust to the waves, as they are loud. Getting in and out of the ocean can also be a bit tricky until you master the technique.
reviews.title: Just Grand

likes.disliked: — too much ongoing construction at the time

aka: Laguna Del Tule Hotel Puerto Vallarta
